content.body: Possibly Private/Local Network Access changes this? Been a while since I looked.
Yes, there are special preflights for PNA: https://developer.chrome.com/blog/private-network-access-preflight#preflight_requests
annevk: Safari blocks http localhost iframes inside https pages. Chrome and Firefox don't. Given that localhost should be treated as secure, this seems like a bug. Am I missing something?
content.formatted_body: annevk: Safari blocks http localhost iframes inside https pages. Chrome and Firefox don't. Given that localhost should be treated as secure, this seems like a bug. Am I missing something?

content.body: https://bumpy-repeated-cover.glitch.me/ - quick test page, but you'll need to run a local server on 8080 that contains `index2.html`
